properties.Name: PackageComponentType
properties.Description:
The type of package component that is used in constructing the packaged product.

Ex:
- Base Product Packaging
- Documentation
- Promotional Gift
- Inner Pack
- Pack
- Set Pack
- Multi Pack
- Case
- Mixed Module
- Display Shipper
- Pallet

Columns.Name: PackageComponentTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Package Component Type.

Columns.Name: PackageComponentTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Package Component Type.

Columns.Name: PackageComponentTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Package Component Type.
